SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
I beseech you, O Dismal King!
Return life to my master in exchange
for my body's blood!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
This door's heavier'n a prize-winnin' steer!
Sure glad you were here with me, 'cause I
never could've opened it on my lonesome.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text: Wait, is this a graveyard? Did we just come out of a grave?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
My master lives once more! All hail
the Dismal King! I, Dolores, swear here
and now that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
I see your head has found its way back upon
your shoulders, Master! Also, you seem to have
been restored to a younger self—more blessings
from the Dismal King, to be certain. Now rest easy, for I, Dolores, shall
serve you as we work to restore the
Dismal King himself!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
This sure seems like a strange place
to be rehearsin' a play or whatever
it is you're doin' there, darlin'.
How about you tell us your name?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Goodness! It seems this resurrection
has left your memory scrambled. But worry not, for I, your loyal servant
Dolores, will aid you with anything
and everything your heart desires.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
I have no idea what's going on here,
but we appreciate your help. My name is—

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Oh! How strange it is for you to introduce
yourself to me, Master! Also, sort of...
disturbing, I guess? Thankfully, we just need a little shock
to the system to restore those memories,
so let's go see the wardens of the
watchtowers who took your life!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Seems like she's mistaking me for
her dead master? Er, or you, maybe?
One of us, at least.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Oh, it don't matter none. All we need
to know is that this here gal is our
ticket to findin' a triangle!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Come, Master!
The first tower awaits!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.text:
Oh! How strange it is for you to introduce
yourself to me, Master! Well, if we want to
get your memories back, we've no choice but
to retrace your steps. And while I understand your being hesitant
to remember the moment you were brutally
beheaded, there's, um...not really another
option. Sorry!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.text:
Time to get going, then!
We're off to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
I beseech you, O Dismal King!
Return life to my master in exchange
for my precious ring, which I offer
now unto the Well of Desires!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
I can't see a thing in here...
Bonnie? Where are you?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
I'm here, hon. Let's just head for that
reddish-black circle there, okay?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
We're finally out of the darkness!
Reckon that circle we saw was
actually the mouth of a well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Actually, I think it was this ring.
I wonder if somebody dropped it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
My master lives once more! All hail the
Dismal King! I, Dolores, swear here and
now that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text: This ring yours, darlin'?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
It helped us find our way out
of that well, so thank you if so.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Darling...? No, Master! I'm your loyal servant,
Dolores! Did the shock of being so brutally
murdered truly make you forget!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
I think you've got the wrong gal.
We only just came to this world,
and ain't nobody murdered me yet.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Greedy_Man
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Well, well! If it ain't Dolores! Bet I'd be
sittin' pretty with the wardens of the
watchtowers if I were to capture ya!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bloodthirsty_Woman
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, she caused a commotion at the towers,
all right—but I bet we'd be sittin' even
PRETTIER if we also gave 'em the weird
chicks who just popped out of the well!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text: Y'all, I am not following any of this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, but this is grim indeed, Master!
These foul people intend to sell you
off to the wardens of the watchtowers!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Well, if they're itchin' to tussle,
I'm happy to oblige!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Greedy_Man
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Just climbed out of a well and already
lookin' for a fight? Well, bring it on,
'cause I'll put ya right back in the
ground where ya came from!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bloodthirsty_Woman
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Corpse pays as much as a prisoner,
so let's just kill 'em all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
We ain't never gonna find what we're
lookin' for if we keep gettin' tangled
up in all this nonsense.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, indeed, Master—so instead, let's go to
the watchtowers and claim the keys to the
Dark Castle! This will all be resolved once
the Dismal King is restored, you see.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text: Lead the way, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
I can feel something in these ruins,
and each time I pray to the Dismal
King, the feeling becomes stronger.
Something...is coming.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
I can't see my hand in front
of my durn face in here!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Watch yourself; there's all kinds
of rubble strewn about.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Say, do you hear someone? I think it's comin'
from over yonder. C'mon, let's check it out.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
My master is returned to me!
Huzzah! All hail the Dismal King!
I, Dolores, swear here and now
that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Appreciate you callin' out to us, hon.
You really saved our bacon.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Oh, I am not the one responsible, Master.
I implored the Dismal King every day,
and he at last saw fit to hear my prayers.
He made it so you would hear my voice!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
When did you hire a cutie like this
to be your personal maid, Bonnie?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
You hush! I ain't the type for all of that—
even just sayin' the word 'master' gives me
the goose pimples somethin' fearsome.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Ah, I see! The shock of being brought back
to life must have you confused. I understand,
and do not worry, for Dolores is at your side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Er, all right then. Also, I got some blanks
that need fillin' in here, startin' with the
identity of this 'Dismal King' feller.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Let's start by heading for the Dark Castle
where the Dismal King resides. We won't
be able to get inside, but I still want to
offer up some words of thanks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text: So this is the Dark Castle, eh?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
O Dismal King, thank you for returning my
master to me! I beg of you, please wait
just a little longer, that we might see you
restored to your former glory once more!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Too bad the pieces seem to be
scattered all over the place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Correct, Master! Each of the four wardens
of the watchtowers has hidden a key—
keys you died trying to acquire.
Er... Do you remember that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Can't say I do, but this sure
makes them wardens sound
like a dodgy bunch of fellers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
They are all terrible louts to the last!
So while we must get the keys from them,
we should avoid any head-on clashes.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
But if we don't clash with them,
we won't be able to find the
triangle we're looking for.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, either way, let's go
check them towers out.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.text:
They are all terrible louts to the last.
And since we need the keys anyway,
we should go kill every last one
of the miserable dastards!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.text:
Well, ain't you just rarin' to go!
You're my kinda gal, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
I sit at the cusp of death, so starved am I!
Have you no thoughts at all as you gaze
upon my sallow, emaciated form?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
B-but we slaughtered an entire pig so
you might eat, milord! 'Tis all we had!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
You believe such a trifle could restore
my body to its full robustness? Pah! Well, if there is naught else to eat,
I've no choice but to consume you.
Though I'd hoped for something rather
more nutritious...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Begging your pardon, milord, but I am
with child. I beg of you, spare us
from the stewpot until he is born.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
A BABY!? Why didn't you fools
lead with that!? I will spare you today—but you must bring me
the child as soon as it is born. For unlike
the tough, bitter skins of adults,
newborn babe is soft and tender.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, thank the heavens!
We survived another month.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
I wonder what my next tribute will be.
Pah! I am mere moments from wasting
away to skin and bone!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
That's the Warden of Gluttony, one of the
watchtower wardens with a key to the Dark
Castle. Despite eating everything he can get
his hands on, he's constantly hungry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Uh-huh, gotcha. And we tried to make
off with his key so he did us in, right?
Sounds like a little payback's in order.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text: Reckon we just march right in.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. Why? If we just 'march in,' 
you're going to get killed again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Let's go ask 'em about the key
and take it from there.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
How honorable you are, Master! I mean,
it's a stupid way to go about things,
but I rather like that about you.
Now lead on and I shall follow!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
EEEK! Please, spare our miserable lives!
We've nothing else to give, I swear!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Heck, we ain't with the warden! We're just
lookin' to get our hands on his key to the
Dark Castle. Figure y'all might know somethin'
useful about that greedy feller.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
A key to... Wait, are you trying to help
the Dismal King!? Oh, bless you ma'am!
If he were back, we'd no longer have to
toil under the cruel yoke of the wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Alas, I fear we know very little about the
Warden of Gluttony, save that his hunger
cannot be slaked and he hoards more food
than any being could possibly consume.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, and he also enjoys uncommon food,
especially if he's never tasted it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Either lots of food or some kinda uncommon
food, eh? Thanks for the tip there, pardner.
Oh, and blessings on the new little one joinin'
the family.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Let's just forget we even met them.
It'll be better that way.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
So lots of food or some kinda
uncommon food, eh? Now where
can a gal find that...?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
There's a livestock farm at the far end
of this town where meat is plentiful.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
That's great and all, but I ain't exactly
Miss Moneybags here; don't reckon I'll be
able to afford much in the way of meat.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Well, I'll be dipped in grease.
These hogs are dead!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Sadly, the plague is ever spreading.
If not for your sake, Master,
I'd never come to such a place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Pardon me there, friend! Don't suppose
you'd be keen to give us these here hogs
for the low price'a 'free,' would you?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Well, that's the best damn offer I've
heard all week! Take 'em all! But for god's sake, don't eat the things.
They'll kill you ten times before you
even hit the ground.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Hon, ain't nobody around here
gonna be eatin' rotted hog.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
So we feed the dead pigs
to the Warden of Gluttony?
A brilliant plan, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
I feel right sorry for these fetid fellers,
lettin' 'em get eaten up by that warden,
but there ain't nothin' for it. Now lend
me a hand hauling these if you would.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Well, we're at the Tower of Gluttony.
What next, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: Meat dive! I'm gettin' in there!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: Let's give him the meat and negotiate.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
We'll handle things from here, hon.
You just hold the fort.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Never! Where my master goes, I go—
even if that happens to be inside a
rotting, diseased, squishy pig corpse!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
The Warden of Gluttony is not one for
negotiation, Master; I fear this plan
will end with your death once again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
That rascal's gonna be rollin' around on
the floor after eatin' all this rotten hog.
That'll be our chance to strike.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Oh! Well, that'll likely work out great.
Brilliant thinking, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Ah, I see my next offering has come.
Now what awaits me this day? Can it be!? Rotten meat—and in such great
quantities! Oh, but tonight will be an
evening of bliss for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
*chomp* *munch* *horf* *snarfle*
This smell! This flavor! This texture!
Nothing in all the world can match it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: Now it's key-huntin' time.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Did the couple from before send this?
I may have underestimated them—the
foul rottenness of this meal is truly
a thing beyond all compare!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
And what a feast! I eat and eat and eat,
but there is yet more! Oho ho ho!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: I found the key, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Rotten meat—and in such great quantities!
Oh, but you are a fine pair indeed—and such
dedication deserves a reward.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Nah, let's leave that talk for later.
You go on and help yourself first.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text: Why, I'm liking you all more and more! If only the others were so thoughtful. But instead, I find myself surrounded by cretins and fools who simply refuse to understand or anticipate my needs! Also, this meat is simply divine. I've never tasted its like before.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Well, ain't you just a man of taste!
Turns out this here's pork from hogs
what died to disease.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
PLAGUEMEAT!? Oho ho ho ho!
How truly succulent!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
This feller's a real piece'a work,
I tell you what...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
We're looking for a triangle, Warden.
Do you know anything about that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Ah, you must mean the key
to the Dark Castle! Strange... There were a couple of idiots
who died trying to collect those a little
while back. Are you perhaps associated with
these unfortunate morons?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Well, either way, my key will do you no good
without the other three, so I'll let the other
wardens worry about that while I gorge myself
on this positively mouth-watering meat! The key is yours.
Best of luck, now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
A triangle? Oh, you two are spies for THEM,
aren't you? Ah, but this world is a cruel mistress,
that a pair who brought me succulent treats
would have such a background.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Sadly, I suppose there's nothing for it
but to kill you—but this little workout
will make my next meal all the sweeter!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
We really gonna be able to find
'uncommon food' in this here well?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh, indeed! In fact, this well will let you
get your hands on food that would never be
found in this world otherwise. Oh, and sometimes you'll find garbage,
though I imagine the Warden of Gluttony
doesn't really care which one he gets.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Must be connected to other worlds somehow.
Well, time to give 'er a try!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text: Yee-haw! Got somethin' on the line!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Yup. This oughta satisfy
the Warden of Gluttony.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Now THERE'S something I've never seen...
Why, it looks positively delicious!
Give it to me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh ho, but it simply melts in the mouth!
While food is best savored in one's stomach,
I am hardly one to shake a stick at doing so
on the tongue as well. Now then, I believe you've earned a
reward for bringing me something so
unusual and delicious.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
We're looking for a triangle, Warden.
Do you know anything about that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
A triangle? Ah you must mean the key to the
Dark Castle. Do you truly believe this meal
was valuable enough to warrant such?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh, I like you two. I didn't think there was
anyone else in this world who understood
food on the same level as myself, but then
you arrived with the souls of a gourmand!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Very well, you may have my key. Be aware,
however, it won't do you any good without
the other three—and I don't expect the other
wardens to be so generous as I. But that is their problem! As for myself,
I shall now immerse myself even further
into a world of a succulent gourmet!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
A triangle? Oh, you two are spies for THEM,
aren't you? Ah, but this world is a cruel
mistress, that a succulent treat should
be poisoned so.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Sadly, I suppose there's nothing for it
but to kill you—but this little workout
will make my next meal all the sweeter!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Got something we want to ask you, Warden:
Why is the Dismal King locked up in the Dark
Castle? And also, do you know anything
about triangles?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
And who are you to be asking such things!?
If you would speak with me, manners and protocol
dictate that you must provide tribute in the
form of delicious foodstuffs!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You there! Maid! You look terribly familiar...
Were you not the servant of the women who
came here to steal the key to the Dark Castle?
The women we later decapitated?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
My master lives again thanks to the power of
the Dismal King—and this time, we are going
to take the key and use it to release him!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
The Dismal King brought your master back?
No. Impossible. Absolutely impossible! What's more, the Dismal King has locked
HIMSELF up in the Dark Castle—we are
simply taking guardianship of the keys
so as to ensure he is not disturbed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
A bald-faced lie! I know the keys have
been scattered and hidden away!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I bet it'll all become clear if we can
just see this Dismal King, so why don't
you be a peach and make with the key?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I am not in the habit of giving anything
to interlopers who arrive before me
without proper tribute! And so, I propose a challenge.
If you win, I'll give you the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Square deal. What's the challenge?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
A battle of the bulging belly!
We shall eat and eat and eat,
and the side who eats the most
shall be declared the victor!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
The Warden of Gluttony wants an
EATING contest!? That's just low.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
This is the Tower of Gluttony!
What other challenge would you
expect given our current setting? Oh, and if you lose, your lives will
be most deliciously forfeited to me.
Now...I would have your answer.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: HERO
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Ring the dinner bell!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: HERO
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Reckon I'll just fight you instead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Nothin' gets me fired up like an uphill battle,
so you'd best come back so hungry you could
eat a barn AND all the horses inside!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: S-such confidence...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Are you certain about this, Master?
Think about who your opponent is!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You're right, hon: I can put it away,
but there still ain't no way we'll
swing this thing by our lonesome.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
We'll need strength of numbers.
Dolores, can you bring us to a
place with lots of people?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Um... Okay?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.text:
My key was stolen, but no matter. Right now,
I must focus on eating something to heal
the wounds upon my mind and body.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.text:
Yet they also knew about the triangles!
Who ARE those people!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Lots of people live in this town,
but I doubt any of them will be
willing to stand up to the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Ah, so that's what you meant
by 'strength in numbers.'

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Listen here, folks! The Warden of Gluttony's
throwin' an all-you-can-eat party, and he's
invited everybody and their ma to come
gorge themselves free'a charge!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
That pig of a warden is holding
a feast for US? I can't believe it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Yessir, he is—but the party only lasts till
the food runs out, so you'd best shake
your spurs if you wanna get yours.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: I'm in!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Me too!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Hey, wait for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Well, this has taken a turn!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Ah, welcome back! I commend you for standing
and fighting our battle even though it is
destined to end with you in my belly.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I think we'll see about that, darlin'.
Now let's get this shindig started.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Whoooa, look at all that food! I had no
idea the warden had such generosity!
NOW LET ME AT IT!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Ho, what are you doing!?
This is a one-on-one battle!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Well now, you never said anything about that.
If you wanted this one-on-one, you shoulda
been clearer about the rules.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You deceived me...but it is no matter!
For I am the Warden of Gluttony,
and none can hope to best me on
the battlefield of food!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: This looks amazing!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: I'm gonna eat till I croak!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Hmph! You people are mere food tourists!
A hundred of you filthy urchins could not
outeat true food nobility such as myself!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
This is the first time I've ever eaten
so much, and I'm so happy I could die.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Not me! I want dessert! DESSEEERT!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: My compliments to the chef!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Why not just give up already?
I have barely begun to dine!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Well, we've only fed a hundred mouths
so far, and there's still three hundred
waiting out there in line.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Y-yes, well, I could eat three TIMES
this amount with...no problem...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You're slowin' down there, big man.
Might be time for you to think about
throwin' in the towel.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I've only...begun to feast...
I...I will devour...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Yoo-hoo, Warden? Hellooo?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: HUUUUUURK!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Hoo-ee! That's grosser than a pile'a
chittlins what's been left in the sun!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Glad we managed to get our mitts on the key,
but I'm gonna need a long shower to scrub
this stench off'a me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I smell nothing but your
own magnificence, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I hear you two were married in secret.
Congratulations! From two lives,
a new one is created. But why keep such a
wondrous thing secret?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You didn't want to pay the marriage tax.
Ah, but it's a pity to tarnish the sacred
act of marriage with such behavior. Still, I am a forgiving man. Your marriage
will be considered legal and binding so
long as you pay the tax by this evening.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Um, and by marriage tax,
do you mean...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
One night of service to me, yes.
The bride? The groom? Both? I care not.
You're free to make that decision yourselves.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I COULD order you to do this, as one cannot
oppose the power of a warden. But this service
is sacred, and coercion is an ugly thing that
does not suit me. Think carefully upon your decision.
I shall be waiting.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And now to decide what kind of service
they shall provide... Oh, just thinking
about it gives me chills! Hss hss hss!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That's the Warden of Lust, Master.
While he tries to hold a polite and
composed facade, his head is filled
with all manner of desirous thoughts. He's also one of the watchtower wardens
who holds a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Uh-huh, gotcha. And we tried to make off
with his key so he did us in, right?
Sounds like a little payback's in order.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text: Guess we just march right in.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. Why? If we just 'march in,' 
you're going to get killed again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
We ain't gonna get that key unless we approach
the man directly—so I think it's about time you
and me got hitched, darlin'.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Marriage... W-wait, you mean ME!? I mean, US!?
The two of us, a happily married couple!?
That's... Oh, but what am I to do!?
My mind is a complete blank...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
PRETEND to be married, hon. Pretend.
You're gonna make a girl blush if you
keep goin' to pieces like that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
EEEK! Wait, please! We didn't say
anything about running away!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
If you're going to take her,
then just take her already!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yes, just take... Wait, WHAT!?
Are you planning to sacrifice
me so you can escape alone!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Heck, we ain't with the warden! We're
just lookin' to get our hands on his key to
the Dark Castle. Figure y'all might know
somethin' useful about that shifty feller.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
A key to... Wait, are you trying to help
the Dismal King!? Oh, bless you, ma'am!
If he were back, we'd no longer have to
toil under the cruel yoke of the wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Alas, the Warden of Lust has a truly terrifying
power: when he stares at you with his shining,
snake-like eyes, you've no choice but to do
exactly as he bids of you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, except for that dog. You know,
the one who bit him? The Warden held
no sway whatsoever over that animal. That said, I don't wish to think about what
happened to the poor dog afterward, just as
I cannot stand to think about what might
happen to me in a similar situation!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
So he can make people do what he wants,
but not critters? That's a right helpful
bit'a info there. Y'all stay happy now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
So mister man there can make folks do
whatever he likes, huh? Seems like
that's gonna be a dilly of a problem.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
I don't understand why he didn't just
use that power on the newlyweds.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
Probably some creepy reason like he
enjoys seeing fear on people's faces.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, I suppose we should start
looking for a dog.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
Sounds good. Heck, maybe we can send
it to fetch the key or somethin'.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: _NOT_SPECIFIED_

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Well, howdy there, Warden!
We've come to pay the marriage tax.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
What!? I had no idea there were
people out there who might pay
my tax of their own volition!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Er, forgive me. I was so overjoyed to find people
who understand and appreciate the true meaning
of the marriage tax that I couldn't help but
exclaim in surprise. I offer my blessings unto your union, and am
glad you understand that the marriage tax
is a gift from me to the pair of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Mighty kind of you. So how we do we pay?
This a personal-check sorta deal or what?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Oh, I will accept a service from
either of you beautiful brides.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Good luck in there, hon!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Right this way, my dear.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Find the key quickly... Please.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: You know it, darlin'.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I gotta move right quick.
But where to start?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage on the right.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage on the left.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage straight ahead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: No key. Next!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Not here, either. I gotta hurry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Heck, the warden must have the key!
No choice now to but to brace him for it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Now then, my dear, let me see
that beautiful body of yours.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Beautiful? Me? Oh, no sir!
Just a plain old body over here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Why, that's not true at all!
The body of each and every
bride is a beautiful thing.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
So you're saying I'm exactly the same as all
the other brides!? You brought me all the
way up here and THAT'S what you tell me!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I... Er, I mean... Of course not!
You are wholly unique and special!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Ugh! This woman is a real pain.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Perhaps a drink, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Don't mind if I do!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: You must feel better now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Oh, that was just delicious.
I'll have another, please!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Er... I mean, of course!
Have as many as you like!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: This one's not normal...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I did not realize you were the
troublesome type, my dear one.
I prefer a more...obedient bride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Well, if I'm not what you're looking for,
I suppose I'll just chalk this all up to
irreconcilable differences and head home.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
All right, this has gone on long enough!
I command you to gaze into my eyes
and beg for my favor!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
No way! Not interested in staring
into your beady little eyes, mister!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Ah, but closing your eyes is futile...
You cannot escape my power...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: M-Master...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Oh, but I can escape it. I very, very much can.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Henchman_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Halt, stranger! I'm under strict
orders not to let anyone into the
warden's private chambers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Oh, bless your heart.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: What's with all the commotion?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: I'm back, Dolores! You okay!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Yes, Master, I'm perfectly fine!
Did you find the key to the Dark Castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
The key to the... Hss hss hss! Oh, but it's
all coming together now. I KNEW I recognized
this bride—you're that maid from before!
But your master is said to be deceased.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
By the power of the Dismal King has she
been returned to life—and we'll be taking
that key so we can aid in his return!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Hss hss hss! Oh, how VERY interesting!
But let us discuss this like civilized
people—what do you need the key for? Depending on your answer,
I just might let you have it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: We're lookin' for a triangle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: This is for Dolores, ya cur!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
We're looking for a triangle, and we
figure this Dismal King of yours might
just know where to find it. 'Course, if you happen to know yourself,
that'd suit us just fine.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
How utterly fascinating. This sounds far
more fun than any service which that maid
or bride or...whatever she is might offer.
You may take the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I'm quite looking forward to what you
will encounter in the Dark Castle...
Now begone before I change my mind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: The triangle! Who ARE those people?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_100_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_100_C.text:
I'm surprised that woman lost
her temper over my treatment
of a maid. Who IS she?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: _NOT_SPECIFIED_

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Is your plan to try and
catch a wolf, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
I mean, I reckon a wolf's gonna be
bigger and stronger than he is.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Scuse me, feller, but have you happened
to hear a wolf howlin' around these parts?
I was hopin' to catch me one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Sorry, you want to CATCH one?
That sounds sort of impossible.
Also, no. I haven't heard any.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Well, shoot. Figured I might be able to
use it to get a key to the Dark Castle,
but I guess I'll just have to figure
somethin' out all on my lonesome.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, hold on. You're planning to release
the Dismal King? Let me help you!
I've got something I need to ask him!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: We ain't looking for hangers-on.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
I'm a wolf tamer, actually—so if you
need one brought to the Tower of Lust,
I am your man.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, well, that there's a different story!
We'll head on over to the Tower of Lust,
and you can bring Mr. Wolf along.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: _NOT_SPECIFIED_

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
You're lookin' a touch
wolf-less there, darlin'.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, don't worry.
It'll come as soon as I call.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
I will have the groom
provide services to me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: Still ain't seein' a wolf.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, don't worry.
It'll come as soon as I call.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Now let me see that well-muscled
body of yours, groom.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
You know, I'd heard the Warden of Lust
was a man of rare beauty, but you're
just sort of...dull. Also tacky.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Hss hss hss! Not yet aware of my charms,
are you? Go on then, look into my eyes.
You will see how truly beautiful I am.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Mmm, sorry, but no. The Warden of Lust may
be beautiful, but you aren't him—you must
be some kind of body double or the like.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
But why!? Why isn't my power working!?
You're just an ordinary man! You're nothing!
What is your secret!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Well, since you're an impostor, you better
just give me the key to the Dark Castle.
I mean, we can't have a nobody like you
carrying something like that around.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Excuse me!? That key is proof that
I am the true Warden of Lust!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Which is why you're gonna
hand it over! AROOOOOO!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: Damnation! You're a werewolf!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Heck, the warden must have the key!
No choice now to but to brace him for it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: I've got the key. Let's go.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Henchman_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: Stop right there!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
You take the key and skedaddle.
We'll deal with the fan club!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Make sure you take me to the
Dark Castle so the Dismal King
can save me. Don't forget!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: I won't. That's a promise.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: How did he manage to get the key?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
This is the Month of Slumber, my good man—
yet a little bird tells me you have been
laboring the days away instead of sleeping
as you should be. Why is this?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm sorry, milord! It's just that...
Well, we're out of food and we're hungry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text: Are you some kind of fool? You're hungry because you're laboring! Why, oh why, does my sacred rest have to be disturbed by packs of idiots like this? It! Is! So! Infuriating!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
But very well! If you desire to toil so badly,
I'll put you to work in the underground mines.
Your shift runs from midnight to midnight,
every day, until you are dead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, no! Please! I'll never work again!
I'll be a regular layabout! Please!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
There can be no clemency for one
who disturbs my slumber. *yaaawn*

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
That is the Warden of Sloth, Master.
He's truly lazy, but doesn't mind
putting others to work. He's also one of the watchtower wardens
with a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Uh-huh, gotcha. And we tried to make off
with his key so he did us in, right?
Sounds like a little payback's in order.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text: Let's help that guy out first.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text: Guess we just march right in.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. Why? If we just 'march in,' 
you're going to get killed again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Much as I don't wanna act like some thief,
we should probably go and grab the key
while he's sleepin'.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
I think you're right, Master.
Let's go steal it at once!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: Now hold on just a durn minute here. Is workin' during the Month of Slumber really an actual crime?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
The Warden of Sloth has done us a great service
by establishing a month in which none may toil.
The wasting of this blessing is an act that
cannot be permitted to stand!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Sure, but if a feller WANTS to work,
it don't hurt nobody to let 'em.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
If a person is so insistent on besmirching
the Month of Slumber, they may pursue their
precious work in the underground mines. Those who wish to rest may sleep.
Those who wish to work will labor.
Such is the compassion of the Warden!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
...Huh. That makes sense, actually.
Sorry for the bother.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
What? No! You have to help me!
That's why you're here, right?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, I wouldn't be averse to lendin' a hand 
if you happen to know a weakness or two
for this Warden of Sloth feller.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Uhhh... Sure I do! I know 'em all!
Now help me already!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: You can't possibly trust this guy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: Let's save him and see what he knows.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: Nope! This feller's a dang liar.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Come then, my pretty! Oh, but you will
SO enjoy the underground mines!
Aha! Aha! Aaah ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Now we tromp right into the tower.
Shoulda just done that to begin with.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
All right then, sweetheart.
Make with the weaknesses.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
The Warden of Sloth has no weaknesses!
And even if he did, there's no way a lowborn
oaf like me would know anything.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text: Let's send this liar to the mines.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
And here I was gettin' my hopes up.
Well, just make sure ya don't go
and get yourself caught again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
Oh hey, look at the time! Gotta go!
Er, and while I don't know what you're
planning, good luck with it anyway.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text: And it's off to the Tower of Sloth!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
I suppose I should have warned them that
entering the tower will make them sleepy...
but after the way they just threatened me,
I think they've earned a little suffering!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Even the guard's asleep.
The Month of Slumber, indeed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Ain't much point in having a guard
if he's gonna shirk his duties.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Shoot, that was easy.
Kinda anticlimactic, actually.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
*yaaawn* Forgive me, Master...
I'm getting a bit tired...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
*yawn* Yeah, same here, hon.
We gotta get to the warden, fast.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Well, heck! He's sleeping too!
Bold as a brass buckle, this feller.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: I love how you play dirty, Master.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
At this rate, we're both going
to fall asleep.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Okay, NOW it's surprise attack time.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: We can take the key now, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Sweet haybales! He ain't hurt at all!
That never happens when I kick folks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
You were a fool to attack me in my sleep,
for it is when the Warden of Sloth is at
his most powerful—and by that, I mean
I am completely invincible!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: And THAT means now's our chance!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
I had no reason to fight for true.
Now back to sleep for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
That feller said the Warden of Sloth hates
loud noises, right? Well, what've we got
on us that can stir up a ruckus?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
WAR WITH THE WARDEN! WAKE UP SLOTH!
WAR WITH THE WARDEN! I'M YOUR NEW BOSS!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
Gyaaa! What is this horrific sound!?
This death growl in my head!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
DEATH AND BLOOD AND GRAVES AND BRAINS!
NOW YOUR SOUL HAS GONE INSAAAANE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
The goddess of death herself has come!
My soul is being torn from my body!
And yet I burn to hear more! More!
MOOOOOOOOOOOORE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
Looks like your audience
is gettin' bigger, darlin'.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: Did you like my singing, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: It was sweet as peach pie!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
I hope someday you'll hear
me sing my song of love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
If you liked that, I bet you'll enjoy this
death metal medley even more!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
Leave that to me. If it'll get us a key to
the Dark Castle, I will spare no effort.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
So you're a wolf-tamer, huh?
And you followed us?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
I'll call a wolf, so just wait for me
outside the tower. Oh, and don't
worry—I'll get that key for you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
A wolf? Blast, this is no dream.
Time for this bat to fly!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
The Warden of Sloth hates wolves,
apparently. That's good to know.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
Didn't see a wolf come through the gates,
but I probably just missed it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
As this month's grand tournament winner,
your prize is a one-on-one battle with me!
NOW COME AT ME, SON!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
B-but you're the Warden, milord!
There's no way I can beat you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
One blow? Seriously!? How could a weakling like
that have possibly won the grand tournament!?
Who in the blazes is running that thing!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Henchman_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Er, me, milord. But the thing is,
we don't have many participants
because no one wants to face y—

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text: Then it's your job to FIND SOME!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Lasted two blows, did ya?
I sure know how to pick 'em! ...Well, crap. I let my anger get the best
of me, and now I'm down a lackey. Again.
Grrr, but that really fries my eggs!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That is the Warden of Wrath. He's constantly 
furious, and ever in search of intense combat.
He's also one of the watchtower wardens
with a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Uh-huh, gotcha. And we tried to make off
with his key so he did us in, right?
Sounds like a little payback's in order.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text: We kick his heinie and take it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That's... Huh. It's not like you to fight
someone so obsessed with battle head-on.
Couldn't we try to take advantage of his
short fuse or something?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
You mean we should use our heads instead?
Yeah, all right. Let's give it a think.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Fight us, feller!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
It's about damn time somebody interesting
showed up around here! Let's just hope
you aren't all talk.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
We wanna know about triangles.
Oh, and we're also gonna need
your key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Then you must first defeat me
in glorious combat!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Looks like you're stronger than I thought.
I'll do you a solid and actually put some
effort into this next one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Then I'll step up my game!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Nope. I think we're done.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Better do like Dolores said and
think this through a bit.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Running away, is it? Good! I love hunting
down fleeing prey—and I'll hunt ya to the
ends of the damn world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Takin' off? Good! Get stronger,
then come back! More fun for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
That feller ain't your run-of-the-mill cowpoke.
We probably wanna get shed of him and go look
for keys at the other towers first.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
The key you seek is
within that flame.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
It's the fire of my spirit—the fire
of rage. And if you want the key,
you'll have to put out my fire!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Well, that ain't so hard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: This ain't workin'. Gotta go!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
My flame grows fiercer! My spirit burns!
I'm grateful to you all, but we're not done!
The fight goes OOOOOON!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
I'm about to squash out that
spirit of yours, sweetheart.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
The flame's gettin' weaker. You talk
a real big game, but deep down I know
you're just yellow.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Yellow? Bah! My heart contains only rage—
rage at the fact I haven't crushed your
damn bones into dust!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Not done... I'm not done...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: We've already won.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
We'll take that key now, but I'm a
bit bushed, so we'll come back later
to talk triangles.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Fun fight though, darlin'!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
A fun...fight? Well, I suppose the fires of
my fury may have been somewhat calmed—
but now we've got these insolent little
whelps sniffing around the triangle!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: You... You're—!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
That warden ain't exactly the
fastest feller around, is he?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Gotta think about this one—not that we
have a heckuva lot of time for that.
I wonder if we could use this well...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
What if we hide in it and wait
for Mr. Bad Bull to run past?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, that just feels so dang obvious.
There's gotta be somethin' else we—

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Damn! He caught up to us
while we were thinking.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
No! The hunt can't end this quickly!
Keep running! Make this FUN!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
You think you're the hunter?
Darlin', you're MY prey.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Sounds like you're taking me lightly.
Last mistake you'll ever make!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
You're amazing, Master! You dodged him
AND looked awesome doing it!
