SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Sometimes I do make it look easy.
Now c'mon! We got us a key to find,
and not long to do it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
Ain't no tellin' what might be waitin'
for us on the other side of the door.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
We should make sure we're good'n ready
before we break the seal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
No need for worry so long
as we're prepared!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text: This is the Dark Castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Hear me, O Dismal King! I have fulfilled
my oath and thrown wide the gates of the
Dark Castle! Reveal yourself to us now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
This Dismal King of yours really here?
'Cause the place seems empty as a
prairie on a moonless night.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
To think the idiots who opened
this gate would be here...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
And now the truth is known: you'd hoped
to meet the Dismal King, but found only
an empty castle. I hope you are happy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Yes indeed! The king is gone, and not even
we wardens know where he might be. Perhaps he fled this life. Perhaps he died.
We care not—for you have no idea how much
we tired of his rule! Oh, but this has all
worked out just beautifully!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
But we're the damn wardens of the watchtowers!
So while we took charge of 'em from the king,
his absence is still troubling.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
If it were to become known that our lord
has abandoned his castle, the people of
this world would no longer heed us.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
But if they believe we have sealed him away,
they also believe the four of us possess
the strength greater than his own.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Oh, but I'm breaking out in goosebumps
just thinking about what punishment
awaits these interlopers!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Don't worry: the four wardens of the
watchtowers will make sure there are
always pretty flowers on your grave!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
We rid the world of the wardens,
but that doesn't get us any closer
to finding the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text: Dolores...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
I'm FREE! And so is all of Yomi!
Oh, thank you, Master! Thank you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text: Oh, and this was on the ground.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
A triangle! I shoulda known them Warden
rascals were tied up with Kiss Stadium!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Yes, it seems one of the wardens was
with Quisstatium—or was at least being
manipulated by them. Regardless, we got the triangle we need,
so our search here is done.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text: So what's the plan now, hon?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
I wish to continue serving at your side,
Master! Wherever you go, Dolores follows!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Sure, but could you stop with
the whole 'Master' bit, maybe?
It's givin' me the willies.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Dolores is just happy to finally have
a fancy lady to serve, Master! Hee hee! But yes, Dolores, we'd be happy to have
you come with us. Welcome aboard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Is that the Dismal King?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: He's a bit different from how I imagined. ...Okay, a lot different. ...Okay, completely different. But yes. That's him.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Hear me, O Dismal King! I have fulfilled
my oath and thrown wide the gates of the
Dark Castle! Please grant my reward now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: No time! We gotta skedaddle!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: The gate's closed!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Oh, but you worked so very hard to meet
the Dismal King! Stay awhile, friends!
Bask in his presence!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King eventually took that form
after repeatedly devouring his subordinates.
Alas, one must always take care not to overeat.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Eventually, the wardens of the seven
watchtowers joined forces to seal
the Dismal King away in his castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
And although three towers and their
wardens fell to ruin, we remaining
four kept watch over the seal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Do enjoy your little tryst
with the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Monster-huntin' it is, then!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Could it be?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: I'll lend a hand.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Do it! Destroy the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Keep going! Don't give up!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
This is unnecessary; there is no longer
any need to seal the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King is no more...
Time for a nap!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Today calls for a banquet!
We'll all eat until we burst!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You people can do as you want,
but I will rule over this castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Not so fast there, snake boy!
I'M the new lord of this world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
A beef-brain like you ruling Yomi?
What a nightmare.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Indeed, a lord must be graceful
and kind—just as I am.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
So I guess those fellers sealed away the
Dismal King with Kuissy Statiam's help?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
It seems so—but seeing as we ultimately
took care of this entire situation,
I think a little reward is in order.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: ...Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King is dead.
I know we did our best,
but I still can't believe it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Don't be down, Dolores.
Think of the future.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Oh, I'm totally fine! After all,
I've got YOU, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Sorry, darlin', but no.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Giddyap, gals! We're ridin' together!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
How could you say something so heartless
when I'm trying so hard to act cheerful?
I hate you, Master! I hate you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Well, that ended up kinda sad.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
That's the way the cow chip crumbles.
Heck, if tellin' the truth makes her hate
us, that tells ya what kind of relationship
we had in the first place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You were strong enough to defeat even the
four wardens of the watchtowers—which means
you might be strong enough to seal away
the Dismal King's power!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Yes, we've been searching for powerful
people such as yourselves who might
fight the king in our stead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Sure wish you'd just said that from
the get-go instead of whatever weird
test y'all been runnin' us through.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Fighting the dark power of the Dismal King
will take serious strength—but if you fight,
you will have the full support of the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Then leave it to us!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Time to RAGE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: A little snack never hurts!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Let's ease down now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Leave this to me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King turned
into a baby!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
It appears his power has been reset.
Good! This should return the flow
of darkness to normal. Also, we now have our king back,
and so have no need of this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
I honestly suspected you fellers were
keepin' the Dismal King prisoner.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
We would never, for the watchtower wardens
are the guardians of the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Until the king returns to his former self,
let us entrust his care to the maid here.
I assume you two will be fine with this?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: That's up to Dolores, now ain't it?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
If it is your wish, Master,
then I will give my all to
raising the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Thanks for everything, Dolores.
You're a real peach.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Are you leaving, Master!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Well, we got the triangle. It's sad,
but we have to say goodbye to this place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
We may not be able to go together,
but I'll always be your maid, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Thanks, Dolores. You take good care
of the Dismal King now, y'hear?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
This little feller can't seriously
be the Dismal King, right!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Ooo, you're a happy wittle baby!
Yes you are!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: Finally, I am shed of that place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
You two were the ones who brought
me outside of the barrier, yes?
You have my gratitude.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Okay, time out. You're REALLY the
Dismal King? Like, honest-to-gosh?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Those who address me usually take a knee
or otherwise show deference, but in light
of your recent good work, I'll overlook it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
The barrier on that castle sealed
my power away—hence why I took
on the form of a baby.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Honey, I don't understand a lick of this,
but I'm surprised as anything that the
Dismal King's a kid; I was expecting an
old grey feller with a long beard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
This is not my true form. If I can pass beyond
the barrier formed by the watchtowers, I will
regain my true form—but alas, said barrier
spans the entirety of Yomi.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Sounds like we gotta take you on a
field trip outside Yomi, then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: Is such a thing even possible?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Huh. Guess even a feller called
the 'Dismal King' can't freely
come and go between worlds. Okay, hon, we'll take you outta this world.
But first, we need to hear if you know
anything about triangles.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
I know nothing of such things.
They do not sound of Yomi.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
So even the big cheese doesn't know about 'em?
Well, I sure hope we run across it before we
take you on outta here, but I guess we'll see.
For now, let's head back to the graveyard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
So even the big cheese doesn't know about 'em?
Well, I sure hope we run across one before we
take you outta here, but I guess we'll see.
For now, let's head back to the well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Well, there's sure as heck a vibe here.
Feels like some nasty thing is just
waitin' to leap out at us.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: It is the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Uh, Dolores? You all right th—

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Hear me, O King! I, the Warden of Pride,
have fulfilled my sacred vow! Among all
other wardens, I alone have proven worthy
to stand at your side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Warden of Pride? Say what now?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
I did not think you would make it here,
Warden of Pride. Your virtue, after all,
is pride—the selfsame quality which makes
you unable to cooperate with others.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
In your arrogance, you played at being queen,
and gloated overmuch of how you surpassed
all other wardens. But I am the Dismal King!
I need no one at my side!
So while you will never admit to such,
you are not worthy to be my queen.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Still, you have my praise for all you have
done up until this point, for I know it must
have been most arduous for one of your
haughty arrogance... Now begone.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Begone? BEGONE? How DARE you say so to me! You, who were trembling in this castle like a miserable cur until I set you free! But fine. If you can't see my true glory, I'll just get rid of you like I did all of the other wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
You never were no danged maid!
You were this thing the whole time!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
And I'm guessin' you got us wrapped up
in this so we'd fight the other wardens.
We got played like a square-dance fiddle!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Not quite. The Warden of Pride—the TRUE Warden
of Pride—coveted the seat of queen and betrayed
the other wardens. But before she could kill them,
she herself was ended instead. I saw this as a good thing overall,
and replaced the warden with this maid.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
But only after entering this castle did she
fully complete the task I had implanted deep
in her mind. So you see, it was not she who
deceived you, but I.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Enough! I am the Warden of Pride,
and I refuse to stand by and let you
claim you somehow manipulated me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Hah!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Urk!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Nnngh...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Now then. As I know you would never
wish for mercy, I will permit you
to perish along with your pride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Hold it right there, feller!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
If anyone's passin' judgment
on Dolores, it's gonna be US!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
This is no longer the maid you knew as Dolores,
but the Warden of Pride—and what becomes of
her is for the Dismal King alone to decide.
Now remove yourself from my sight!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Hmm... It would seem your determination is
not borne of mere arrogance. Given this,
perhaps it is better for this warden to
serve her master as a maid after all.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Your maid carried this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
The triangle! But wait, does that
mean she was with Quisstatium?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
This triangle had a considerable influence on
the Warden of Pride's decisions—and in fact,
she is now even more prideful than before.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Heck, that thing ain't no joke.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
M-Master...? I think I...blacked out.
Oof, and everything hurts...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
The Dismal King was just praisin'
all your good work, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
He...he said that about ME!?
Oh, but that's wonderful!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Now begone, all of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Well, look who finally figured it out...
Oh, but my performance was absolutely
RIVETING, wouldn't you say? And while it wouldn't have been difficult
for me to kill the other wardens alone,
I had to save my strength to topple the
Dismal King here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
And as for you, my king...
Bow your head and beg forgiveness!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Were you tryin' to kill the Dismal King
this whole dang time?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Kill him? I wanted to be his QUEEN!
None but I possess power and beauty
enough to stand at his side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Hey, you wanna be queen or warden or whatever,
be my guest. We just need to find the triangle
and then we'll get outta your hair.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Well, shoot. Guess we'll just have
to go lookin' ourselves, then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Wait! Don't just up and leave!
The triangle... The triangle...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
The triangle is yours if you fight me!
Yes, that's it! Fight me for it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
What're you so worked up about?
Ain't it enough to be a queen?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
No! I must grant your wish!
I won't stand for any alternatives!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
Not sure why you're so chipper when we
can't get a triangle unless we fight you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
You think you can win against me, Master?
The one who took down the Dismal King?
You should be more worried for your LIFE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
Okay, I thought you didn't know about
the triangles, but now you're standin'
here holdin' one of the durn things!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text: This is the work of Quisstatium.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text:
I still remember the shocked look on your
face when we first met Dolores here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text:
Heck, can you blame me? Out we popped,
and suddenly some lady's callin' us 'Master'? 
I thought we were dealin' with a real loon.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text:
And now we're hearin' things.
See you up the trail a ways, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Say, has the Tower of Wrath
always been like that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
With the Dismal King released, Master,
you are now seeing Yomi's true form—
as well as the true forms of the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, I'll be deep-fried—
he DOES look different!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I thought cowards like you might steal
treasures in the Dark Castle, but you went
and released the Dismal King instead...
AND NOW YOU'RE GONNA PAY!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
You went tail-over-teakettle into the well
all on your lonesome, hon—but I guess 
we'll fight you fair and square this time.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Stand down, Warden—unless you are truly
so ignorant of the power I wield?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, I know it well, my king...which is why
I'm gonna stick you back in that castle
and make you a damn baby again!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I must say, you do impress.
It's no mean thing to bring down
the strongest of all wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, ain't that a right honor!
But we still gotta take a care not
to get too big for our britches.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
When a wise person wishes to avoid
direct conflict, they employ a detour.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, yes... I sense the presence of some
of my thralls, faint though it may be.
Perhaps they have escaped the wary eyes
of the wardens by hiding in the city? Still, I know they will work themselves
to the bone and beyond for my sake.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So we gotta choose between the direct
approach or a detour? What a pickle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Gotta say, I got my doubts about this plan.
You say these thralls will work to the bone
for you, but ain't they been hidin' from the
wardens this whole time?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
They cannot disobey my words,
and would never betray me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, nobody's gonna accuse you of lacking
confidence, hon. Let's see what you've got.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Full glad am I to come face-to-face
with you, my thralls. I must venture across our lands without drawing
the attention of the wardens, that I might
regain my true strength. As such, I would have
you travel ahead and draw their eyes from us.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yup. That's some incredible power, all right.
How'd you get these people to be your thralls
in the first place, anyway?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text: Would you care to learn for yourself?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'll pass on that one, thanks.
I don't bark at nobody's command.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
There were once a full seven watchtowers in Yomi,
each symbolizing one of the virtues of darkness:
pride, greed, envy, wrath, sloth, gluttony,
and lust. Yet some have now been lost forever.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
These ruins—where the Tower of Pride
once stood—are one such instance. Indeed, you served the Warden of Pride,
maid. Do you remember this?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
I have a vague recollection of working here
a long while ago, but it's...fuzzy. I think it
was from a time before I knew my master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
But if you say it is so, then it must be.
How incredible that you might know so much
about even a base maid like me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends. I have waited long and long for a chance
to hunt the Dismal King, and so followed
you when I heard you left his lair.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I know well that you seek a triangle.
Permit me to take my quarry, and it will
be yours. Resist me, and you will die.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: Nope. I'm protectin' the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You're gonna have to wake up earlier
than that to get the cheat on us!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: You're more fool than I imagined!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Master! The Dismal King is
surrounded by fiends!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Fear not, for they are my servants,
and will allow us to avoid the
watchtowers. Now hurry aboard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Glad you got a plan, but ain't those fiends?
What's to say they ain't gonna buck us off
or try and take a bite out of us?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
They will not because I forbid it.
The ride, however, is far from gentle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
You had this thing all ready!? Ah, but it seems it is not my destiny to hunt
the Dismal King. This means their curse shall
be passed to you...and that I am free!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
How could you make such
a cruel choice, Master!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Anyhow, with the king gone and all,
this is farewell. So long, hon.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
It's always like this: overly indulging
in sloth always leads to the worst of
all possible outcomes. I can't believe you were enough of an idiot
to take the Dismal King out of his castle!
I really should have taken you more 
seriously when first we met...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
You got your true form back thanks to us.
Little gratitude wouldn't go amiss.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text: True form? Are you half asleep!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Do as she bids, Warden: close the gates
of your tower and go to sleep. Or do
you wish to be subjected to endless
days without rest once more?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
I have a better idea: why don't YOU
go back to the Dark Castle and sleep
as a peaceful little baby? Such sleep is a supreme pleasure only babies
might experience...and it would be a waste
to casually toss such a thing so aside!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Do the wardens not realize
their forms have changed?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
No, because they haven't
changed—Yomi has.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
So what're you gonna do when you
get your full power back?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
You are not of this land;
my actions do not concern you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text: Eh, we better take him out.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text:
You are more given to fighting
than I first imagined.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text:
The path cleared for us by my thralls
has been closed. We have no choice
but to fight our way through.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text: Good thing we're all limbered up!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_200_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_SLOTH_200_CUT_000.text:
We already avoided this with my flying
conveyance. There is no need to return
to the Tower of Sloth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_CUT_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Lust is freedom, and such a thing runs counter
to command by a regent. Yet because we live in
the world of darkness, we have been ruled by
a king of it. What a contradiction it is.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Lust is true darkness, which means we have no
need of a king. Even with the seven watchtowers
reduced to four, we still managed to oppose
your cruel reign and seal you away.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
This form is the true darkness.
The true Yomi.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Cast aside your freedom, Warden, for its
lack creates value from desire—and that
is from whence darkness is born.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
It is you who should cast freedom aside,
for the Dismal King ought be the least
liberated of all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Suppose you wouldn't have to work
if you were still a baby.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Alas, it is too late. In the end,
I am the only remaining warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
You know, you don't gotta oppose the king
so much that it cuts into chow time.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Indeed, I would be content if I could 
live a simple life of voracious eating.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Yet I cannot, for if the Dismal King's
rule is restored, I will be forced to eat
for his sake once more, and all will
again taste as ashes in my mouth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Warden, covet life. You need no purpose.
A reason for living is unnecessary.
Simply hungering for life is the duty
of all subjects of the dark.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
I just want to eat lots of delicious food!
To savor it and not simply throw it down
my gullet like an unthinking machine!
Will you not even allow me that much!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
These subjects of the dark
sure seem to have it hard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Compared to the toil of their king,
the wardens and their brethren might
as well be sleeping through existence.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
I eat and eat, but still desire more.
Yet when someone tells me I MUST eat, 
I no longer want to. This is what the
presence of the Dismal King means!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
I hear that, hon. It's like how when someone
tells you to study, you lose all motivation.
Still, maybe you can try some self-restraint?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Eating all one wants is our natural state.
Should doing that cause me to become a pig,
then a pig I shall be.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Eat, Warden. Eat greedily. Such is your
duty as one of the subjects of the dark.
Eat without rest. Eat without pause.
Devote yourself wholly to the act.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
No! I don't want that! That's exactly what
makes me not want to eat! So I'm going to
make YOU eat, and eat, and eeeat!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
You're every bit the king
your name implies, ain't ya?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text: It seems I'm the only one left.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
This doesn't have to mean the end of all
the wardens. Heck, I think now might
even be the time to ask forgiveness.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Forgiveness? There is no such word in the
Dismal King's lexicon. And I also do not wish
it, for desire is unforgivable by nature.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
We seven wardens staked our existence on the
unforgivable act of sealing away the king.
Setting aside the three towers that are lost,
how can any of us seek forgiveness?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ask for my forgiveness, Warden.
The Dismal King alone can grant
you clemency. So ask.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
An invitation so sweet I am seized with the
desire to fall to my knees and kiss your feet.
Indeed, I would entrust my entire body to you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
...But I cannot, for you will simply kick me
while I am on my knees begging forgiveness.
For you are the Dismal King, and even if I
desire you, such lust can never be satisfied.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
You look like a little tyke, but you sure
ain't actin' like it. Maybe them wardens
are all seein' you as you really are.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
You have poor eyes. Nothing more.
Do not trouble yourself over it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
We've arrived. And you claim we can
reach the world outside Yomi from here?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: If you're with us, yup.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Then let us hurry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Here's the thing, hon: we still don't have
the triangle. You said you don't know—

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Alas, it is the Lord of Darkness's fate
to be hunted down by me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Didn't your mama teach you
it's rude to interrupt!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends. I have waited a long time for a chance
to hunt the Dismal King, and so followed
you when I heard you left his lair.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I was worried those awful wardens might get
him first, so I appreciate your safeguarding
him all this way. Thanks to you, my hunt will
surely prove a great success!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
If you've been keepin' eyes on us this
whole time, you must know we didn't
haul him all this way for your sake.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
And what exactly are you hoping to accomplish
by taking the Dismal King out of this world?
He lacks anything but the power to bring about
darkness, and his presence benefits none. Instead, let me take him. In this way,
at least my employer and I will benefit.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
We ain't makin' any deals
till you let him go!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
You must think me a proper fool!
But no, I'll not let this chance
slip through my fingers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Nothing will be settled by standing
about staring daggers at each other! You seek a triangle, do you not?
Permit me to take my quarry, and you
will be able to obtain what you desire.
Do you find these terms acceptable?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Might'a considered it if you'd laid it out
that way from the start, but I can't trust
a word you say now—so I'm gonna get that
triangle by kickin' in your behind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Damnable cur!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I lack the patience to continue this!
I'd rather risk getting killed by you
than permit the king to escape!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: What the!? My leg!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Damn you, Dismal King!
You've risen the dead from their graves!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
The dead are surrounding us
as well, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Damn it all—and damn YOU,
Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
We gotta get after him if he's
really got our triangle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Is the king all right?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Milord!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: ...Oh. He's just sleeping.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I dunno what kinda powers this fella's got,
but if takin' him out of the world is gonna
muck things up, we might wanna think
twice about that part of the plan.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Master, I...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Please take care of the
Dismal King, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Gladly, Master! And with my wish granted
and the Dismal King returned to me,
I no longer have need of this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: What'n the heck!? This is...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Farewell, Master!
I'll never forget you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Now then...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Let's go, milord.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I'm relieved you managed to get past all
those villainous wardens; you would have
faced defeat had you fought them head-on
like an honest fool. You also have my thanks for getting the king
here safely—it was impressive work. And thanks
to that work, my hunt for the Dismal King will
now prove a great success.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Sorry, but our work ain't done yet,
so we can't let you off the king here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Verbal negotiations are concluded.
Now let my strength speak for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Finally, I have hunted down the Dismal King,
and so been freed from the sway of this most
fell item! Thank you, my ladies! Thank you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I take it Quisstatium ordered you
to hunt the Dismal King?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
So the triangle holds the power to bind
people to their will... Are the pair of you
also bound in this way?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
That hunter really did it...
He captured the Dismal King... Oh, but this is the end of Yomi!
I don't know what I should do...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Aw, don't look so glum, sugarplum.
If you're that worried about it,
you can just leave Yomi with us!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I would go anywhere so long as
I can be by your side, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
With that, I leave responsibility of the
Dismal King to you–for I am finally free
from the sway of this fell item!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
You have done well to aid me,
maid. Live well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Why don't you come along with us, Dolores?
Busy pair'a gals like us won't have time to
look after the Dismal King anyway.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, please! I ask that you hear
my request, O Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, if it isn't Mr. Wolf Tamer.
Now that I'm thinkin' back on it,
he did wanna make a request of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
What is your request, werewolf? I pray you
will not ask to be freed from your plight, 
for how could I, the Dismal King, permit
you to cast away your innate dark power?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Heck, he ain't a wolf-tamer at all—
he's a darned WEREWOLF!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
I can hide nothing from you, milord:
I do wish to end my time as a werewolf.
I know this to be a wish unbecoming one
of the dark, but ask it of you anyway.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Then I offer two paths: continue living
as a werewolf, or die and be free of it.
Make your decision.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
It is a wise decision to continue in
my service as a subject of the dark.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text: Well, I guess we're done here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
Can't believe I'm jumpin'
into a grave again...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
It's time for us to leave this world,
Dolores. Thank you for everything.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
You're that wolf-tamer feller!
But sure, come along.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
With the Dismal King the way he is,
he won't be able to grant my wish.
There can be no further meaning
in my remaining in this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
You sure abut this? I wouldn't want you
to regret nothin' at the end of the day.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
Nay, YOU will be the one with regrets!
Do you not see what he truly is!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text: Master, wait! Don't leave me behind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text: You wanna jump into the grave, too?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text:
No, I don't want to go in a grave...
but I want to be left behind even less!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text: Well then, how's about we go together?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Can't believe I'm jumpin'
into a grave again...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_001.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_001.text:
Can't believe I'm jumpin'
into a well again...

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_002.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_002.text:
We should be able to get back
through these ruins.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Guess this is farewell, huh?
So long, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
With the Dismal King the way he is,
he won't be able to grant my wish.
There can be no further meaning
in my remaining in this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, ain't no skin off our apples,
so long as you won't regret it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Nay, YOU will be the one with regrets!
Do you not see what he truly is!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Truth exists regardless of my words.
Simply look, and you will see.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Heck, he ain't a wolf-tamer at all—
he's a darned WEREWOLF!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text: Sorry, we don't need a werewolf.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text: I'd love me a werewolf pal!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
In that case, I will handle him.
Thank you for your cooperation.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Take him or don't—it means nothing
to me, and you should do as you please.
The prey I truly seek is not so small a catch.

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Your judgment is unsound. This man
is my prey, and I will never permit him
to leave with you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text: Master, wait! Don't leave me behind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
You also wanna jump into
the grave, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
You also wanna jump into
the well, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
No, I don't want to go in a grave...
but I want to be left behind even less!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
No, I don't want to go in a well...
but I want to be left behind even less!

SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W03_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text: Well then, how's about we go together?
